Production: Break Thru Films, Silver Reel, Trademark Films
Plot: In a story depicted in oil painted animation, a young man comes to the last hometown of painter Vincent van Gogh (Robert Gulaczyk) to deliver the troubled artist's final letter and ends up investigating his final days there.
Title: Loving Vincent
Actors: Douglas Booth, Josh Burdett, Holly Earl, Robin Hodges
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 22 wins & 51 nominations.
Genre: Animation, Biography, Crime, Drama, Family, Mystery
Writer: Dorota Kobiela, Hugh Welchman, Jacek Dehnel
